body:
Hello,


I would suggest to use 'radiance' and 'radiance-materials' packages from
ubuntu repository.
On Ubuntu, use this command: sudo apt-get install radiance
radiance-materials


Hope this will help :


qiuzhongzhu at shiep.edu.cn wrote:
